articles.author: daniel.hani@sprylab.com
articles.title: Solar eclipse 2023: How to see October's 'ring of fire', the biggest cosmic event of the year - BBC Science Focus
articles.description: Here’s everything you need to know about the Great American Eclipse and how to see the spectacular 'ring of fire' this October.
articles.content:
Get ready for the most exciting astronomical event of 2023; an annular ring of fire solar eclipse.
An annular eclipse is one of the most spectacular types of eclipse, and the next one will cut right… [+15355 chars]
